Chap. Fifty-Seven - 

Exercise and Health [NOTE: SEE
THE ADVENTIST HOME, PP. 493-530,
SECTION XVII, "RELAXATION AND RECREATION."]

     Well-regulated Employment and Amusement.--In order for children and youth to have health, cheerfulness, vivacity, and well-developed muscles and brains, they should be much in the open air and have well-regulated employment and amusement.
